document.full_text: almost half the united states -- the north central region, the midwest and the northeast -- faces a high risk of spring flooding over the next two weeks, government forecasters said on thursday.
document.title: almost half of u.s. faces spring flooding: noaa
lines_and_colors: almost half the united states -- the north central region, the midwest and the northeast -- faces a high risk of spring flooding over the next two weeks, government forecasters said on thursday.
